title: (x) "Remain Opposed" compact slab serif - Contact BdCd {Mike F}
content:
Hi, a bit of help would be fantasic! Thanks

 [‹ (x) VIBE magazine cover sans - FB Vibration {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181724/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33071 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lettering from the Statue of Liberty Enlightening the World ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181724/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33060 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lil

comments.content: A sample would be fantastic too...

I think it is there now...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181724im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/get_Font_Image-6_4603.png)

Contact Bold Condensed - stretched a bit? Available digital versions I’m aware of are [OLContact Classic Bold Cond](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181724/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ortizlopez/ol-contact-classic/) and [Neo Contact Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181724/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neo-contact/).

Edit: Oh yeah ... and URW’s [Marlboro](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181724/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=marlboro).
